channel.title: How do you get to sleep?
channel.description:
Well im sitting here at half 12 at nite, not to late but i have school for the first time in 15 weeks in the morning, cant sleep, so i thought id ask your opinions on how you get to sleep, if you have any tricks, and im geussing most of you (mostly pwnd im geussing this) will answer "with a lovely wank" Yeah i dont actually have any tricks.. i usually dont have trouble sleeping :)
edit:- actually i know you will call me emo but when im really pissed off the only way i can sleep is by cutting myself.... last time i did it i cut a heart into my chest with a safety pin after 3 hours of trying to sleep, after i had done it i fell straight to sleep.... anyways yer im ok with people flaming me for that :D
suggestions that i must try and are pretty cool so far:-
Put a hard pillow over your head and a soft one under your head (something to do with pressure) overdose on meds (i tryed that before, just took like 6 paracetemol and i got a tingly sensation all over my body) Listen to music (my friend does this although i have no idea how he can sleep with music on)

item.title: How do you get to sleep?
item.dc:creator: @Scar Scar
item.description:
@Scar wrote:

i think the cause of people that say they need lots of time to get in sleep have too much energy.
On a normal day when it’s school i usually drink 2 or more energy drinks and i cant sleep good but in the weekends i go outside and play football with some friends and stuff so when i come home i have almost no energy and i fall into sleep in like 2 minutes

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get to sleep?

item.title: How do you get to sleep?
item.dc:creator: @PussyCrunch PussyCrunch
item.description:
@PussyCrunch wrote:

Want to know the best way to get to sleep? Well here it is…

Smoke a little weed. You don’t even need much for it to get you tired, espescially if it’s you’re first time.

If you’re under the age of 15, I don’t reccomend this. If you’re 15 + , light it up!!

No pressure though, if you don’t like this method, you can use the other hundreds. If I can’t go to sleep this is what I do.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you get to sleep?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Got_Shine, post:45, topic:13832”][quote author=Portal link=topic=20681.msg257540#msg257540 date=1158710090]
This is a bad habbit but having something to eat right before you go to bed seems to tire the body more effectively than anything; but, this is how you will put on weight. Maybe another problem you might be thinking about girls too much?? in that case just polish one off and you’ll knock out rofl…just had to say it.
[/quote]Doesn’t matter if you eat it in the morning, or at night. You’ll digest it the same.

I think… [/quote]
If you eat before sleeping you digest at a slower rate seeing how you’re not really doing anything to burn calories…althought the blood it takes to digest something runs to your stomach making you feel tired so i guess it would work.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you get to sleep?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

hmm… I do many things… I pray alot and that helps me to sleep sometimes I run through things im gonna do tommorow or ill sometimes think about what my girlfriend is dreaming about or if she’s awake and thinking about me. though, I drink very often and heavily (like 9 beers or so). So I usually pass out randomly where ever I lay.
Sometimes I just wank and I pass out, but I never find anything good on tv. Since the cable company found out I spliced my neighbors cable. Now I just get crap shows… like nocturnal emissions…
